addProviderToAccessList(address).details: Adds a provider to the access list

computePeerUsed(bytes32).details: Returns the boolean flag indicating whether the peer exists in the deal

creationBlock().details: Returns the creation block of the deal

cuCountPerWorker().details: Returns number of CUs in a worker

getActivatedWorkerCount().details: Returns the worker count. Worker is a compute unit that has a worker ID

getWorkerCount(address).details: Returns number of workers in provider

getWorkers().details: Returns workers registered in this deal

isProviderAllowed(address).details: Returns the boolean indicating whether the provider is allowed or not

maxWorkersPerProvider().details: Returns the max number of workers per provider

minWorkers().details: Returns the min number of workers

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pricePerCuPerEpoch().details: Returns the price per CU per epoch

removeProviderFromAccessList(address).details: Removes a provider from the access list

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

targetWorkers().details: Returns the max number of workers

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
